languages.text: "Архонт вряд ли отказал бы себе в удовольствии принять участие в рейде..."
"The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."
languages.original_text: "Архонт вряд ли отказал бы себе в удовольствии принять участие в рейде..."

traits.locale_text: "The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「アーコンは、襲撃に参加する喜びを抑えることなどほぼなかっただろう…」
languages.original_text: "The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."

traits.locale_text: 「アーコンは、襲撃に参加する喜びを抑えることなどほぼなかっただろう…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “那个执政官看来是忍不住了，打算亲自动手……”
languages.original_text: "The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."

traits.locale_text: “执政官很享受劫掠的乐趣，基本肯定会亲自参与……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « L'archonte ne se priverait certainement pas du plaisir de prendre part à un raid... »
languages.original_text: "The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."

traits.locale_text: « L'archonte ne se priverait certainement pas du plaisir de prendre part à un raid... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Sería inusual que el Arconte se negara a participar en una incursión».
languages.original_text: "The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."

traits.locale_text: «Sería inusual que el Arconte se negara a participar en una incursión».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Der Archon würde sich das Vergnügen einer Razzia wohl nicht entgehen lassen ..."
languages.original_text: "The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."

traits.locale_text: "Der Archon würde sich das Vergnügen einer Razzia wohl nicht entgehen lassen ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Arkon, kendini bir baskına katılma zevkinden kolay kolay mahrum bırakmaz."
languages.original_text: "The Archon would hardly deny himself the pleasure of taking part in a raid..."

traits.locale_text: "Arkon kendini bir baskına katılma zevkinden kolay kolay mahrum bırakmaz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
